# AI Literature

Extra Activities

After receiving the AI workshop in your classroom, you can follow up and reinvest what you’ve learned with these fun and engaging activities around online privacy and digital citizenship. These lessons are designed to help students develop safe online habits, maintain a healthy relationship with their screen time and protect their digital privacy. Each lesson starts with a short class discussion to introduce the key concepts. Activities can be done offline. Finally, the lessons ends with a short wrap-up discussion.
Lessons are independent from one another and can be done over the course of a few days or a few weeks (one activity a week for exemple).
